condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Les partenaires nationaux et locaux disposent de capacites renforcees pour conduire, d?une maniere participative, une reforme dusysteme educatif fondee sur le respect des droits de l?enfant, l?equite, l?inclusion, la qualite de l?enseignement et la bonnegouvernance du systeme.

description.narrative: General and subject matter curricula for pre-primary, primary and secondary education in Tunisia are being updated (first time since 2002), jointly with the reconstruction of the teacher training system, with the framework of the 2016-2020 education plan and with Unicef technical assistance | Status:On-track | As-of Date:07/01/2019
